description: According to Williams, �a gentle 16' reed of the Krummhorn type, sometimes treble half only and found on secondary manuals ... found in organs by the Serassis and others�. The Serassi family made organs from 1730 to 1860.
examplesDescription: Corno inglese 16' (treble), Concert; Notre Dame de l'Assomption, Tende, France; Serassi 1807 (restored 1971).
